messages.subject: re:censoring
messages.msgSnippet: hi this topic of austin powers rekindled a thought of controversy in showing rocky horror picture show at 10pm on the first day of the live and learn
messages.messageBody:
hi
this topic of austin powers rekindled a thought of controversy in
showing rocky horror picture show at 10pm on the first day of the live
and learn conference. i thought my, my kid would probably be okay with
it but the sexual intercourse , not so graphically displayed, would no
doubt be problematic to some parents , I must warn them to tell the
unsuspecting. but this line of comments allows me to just join in on
the experience of absorbing and trying to understand peoples reactions
and reflecting on my own over protectiveness.
patrick
